name: Bellingham Publicly Owned Fiber Optic Network Quest for Justice
name_original: Bellingham Publicly Owned Fiber Optic Network Quest for Justice
description:
A side scrolling adventure where you get to fight the cowardly, corrupt, members of the City of Belligham Washington's City Council, mayor and Upper Echelon Staff that are preventing the public from having real internet choice on behalf of the big telecoms. 

Please sign the petition at 

https://www.change.org/p/mayorsoffice-cob-org-bellingham-public-fiber-optic-netw...
